steps.name: I am on the PDS homepage
I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-1/gallery-component/gallery-component-images-and-videos/"
the gallery component is loaded
there are multiple assets in the gallery
each asset should have a title or caption displayed
the title should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and the font size should be "24px"
the carousel area should have left and right arrow icons
Clicking on each image should display same image in larger size,default first image should be enlarged
I am on the PDS homepage
I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-1/gallery-component/gallery-component-images-and-videos/"
the user clicks on the right arrow icon in the carousel
the carousel should move to the next asset
the user clicks on the left arrow icon in the carousel
the carousel should move to the previous asset

elements.name: Verify Highlighting colour of Selected Photos in gallery for PDS site

steps.name: I am on the PDS homepage
I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-1/gallery-component/gallery-component-images-and-videos/"
I click on a photo in the below strip
the clicked photo should be highlighted in orange colour for PDS site
the corresponding bigger image should have background color black
color of arrow icon should be blue

I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-5/quote/"

the quote text should have font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "48px" and weight should be bold
the quote author text should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "18px"
the background color of quote should be "#f7f8fc"

I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-5/quote/"

the carousel should display with a maximum of 3 quotes

the quote title should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "24px" and weight should be bold in first quote
quote text should have font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "48px" and weight should be bold in first quote
the quote author text should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and the font size should be "18px" in first quote

the background color of quote should be "#f7f8fc" for second quote
the user clicks on the dot for quote 3
the carousel should display the third quote
the third quote component should have quote text, title and author displayed
the quote title should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "24px" and weight should be bold in third quote
quote text should have the font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "48px" and weight should be bold in third quote
the quote author text should be in "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size should be "18px" in third quote
the background color of quote should be "#f7f8fc" for third quote
verify that title, text and author are different to check new quote is loaded

elements.name: Verify the presence and properties of the information component

steps.name: I am on the PDS homepage
I navigate to the "safe-house/other-testing/sprint-5/information-component/"
the text in the information box should contain "Brushing your teeth twice a day could lower your risk of developing cardiovascular disease."
the "Did You Know?" text should be "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size is "20px"
there should be an icon displayed
the other text should be "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size is "18px"
I click on the button, response should be 200

steps.name: I am on the PDS homepage

the magazine carousel should contain a right arrow and 4 cards
each magazine carousel card should be clickable with a 200 status code
each card should have an image and a description
the card title is having font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size "20px" on Magazine Carousel
the card description is having font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size "18px" on Magazine Carousel

the card description is having font family "Poppins, sans-serif" and font size "18px" on Two column Magazine Carousel
